casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Rayford Lewis BURKE. No. 181A93-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Asheboro, for Burke, Rayford Lewis. Gretchen Engel, Durham, for Burke, Rayford Lewis. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Mikko Red Arrow, Assistant District Attorney, for State of N.C. Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 29th of August 2014 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Iredell County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County: "Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016." ERVIN, J. recused.

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. A record necessary for determination of the issues presented in the Petition for Writ of Certiorari shall be filed on or before April 22, 2016. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 13(a)(2).
